info.headline: Extreme Heat Warning issued June 16 at 1:18PM MDT until June 17 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 105. For the Extreme Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 110 expected.
* WHERE...Chaves County Plains.
* WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 7 PM MDT this evening. For the Extreme Heat Warning, from noon to 7 PM MDT Tuesday.
* IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat events. Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
